title: Imadi yaThembi lebalulekile
description: Lentfombatane lencane yemswati yakhula nemadi lemangalisako. Lemadi ya Thembi lemvikela etingotini ngekusitwa yinyoni lencane,  lenyoni imsita ngekutsi akhone kutfola indlela yakhe leya ekhaya ngemuva kwekulahleka.

title: (Siiga mu katabo)Omukazi owo mululu
description: Siiga mu katabo. Enjala weba ekuluma,  kisinga ko nooba wa mazima mukifo kyo kuba.
author: Uganda Christian University

title: Lilanga la-Abike
description: Lena yindzaba lentiintjiwe yetibalo lephatselene nekuphindzaphindza,  emaphethini,  bobunjwa kanye netihloko letimayelana nekulinganisa,  ngekusebentisa indzaba yelilanga linye emphilweni ya-Abike,  loyintfombatana yesigodzi leneminyaka lelishumi budzala.

title: Bante ni Baabula
description: Bante ayenda okuzaanha aye tayenda sabbuuni n'okweyondha. Obwire bulala yaloota ekilooto ekigema ku buwuuka. Ekilootokye kiida kucuusa obulamu bwe endowooza ye ku kweyondha.

title: mughala wange polar
description: Olugero lu inhonola omughala gwe beeta polar eya yenda nga ku ghulirisa no ku koba engero. Kion kya mwendesa inho abasomesa ni maama ghe.

title: Daisy oweriswekerya
description: Okwakalima kake Daisy kwahimbire,  akakoko akakayighomba erihulhuka. Esindi syangoko sikakasekerera obuli kiro ngokwakayihirakyoko erihuluka. Nikwa kiro kighuma muhabya ekyeriswekerya…….

title: Ompanga n'ompala
description: Ompanga yabbaire kyabazinga gh'ebisolo paka empala ghegyazwire obukodyo bwe.

title: Baboon chief
description: If this chief's followers had questioned his silly orders,  it would have saved his life! (Also available at Level 3.).
author: African Storybook

title: Akay Tangaraa Kaŋ Ga Maamaacandi
description: Wandiyo fo no kaŋ za a ga zanka kala a beeri, a gonda nga tangara fo kaŋ ga maamaacandi. Akay tangaraa ga a w anda hari futo. Curayze fo no ga tangaraa gaakasinay a ma du ga di nga fonda, hari banda kaŋ a daray tondey game ra.

title: Wankoko ni wampala

title: omukyala owomululu omunji
description: Bwo banga enjala ekukluma kisinga ko okwogela amazima mukiffo kyokuba.

title: Abla

description: Inzala nibaihuluma shelayi waba uwekamazima mushifo shokwiba.

title: Mokoko Le Lengau

title: Daisy Owekyewunyoo

title: Mughala wange Polar

title: Qondaala Jaldeessaa
description: Waa'ee qondaala jaldeessaa hamaa tokkofii hordoftootta isaa. Barbaachisummaa hordoftoota ajaaja mootii isaani hin fudhanne.

title: Abla

title: Baboon chief

description: Mofaalma yonhumba omwa li okaxuxwa kedina Daisy,  oko kwa li ka itavela kutya ota ka dulu oku tuka. Eexuxwa dikwao oda kala noku ka yola eshi taka kendabala oku tuka keshe efiku. Ashike efiku limwe,  opa ningwa oshiima oshikumwifi….

description: Mukukulume wo vha u khosi ya dziphukha u swikela didingwe li tshi wanulula vhukwila ha mukukulume.

He shook the tree so hard that the fruit fell on Goso's head and killed him instantly. The children were very upset and wanted to find out who had killed their teacher.

author: Translators without Borders

title: umusi wigisirani
description: Umugani mwiza wa bahugu babiri bafashwe nabagirabi bashaka umutango.
author: Kagame Bruce

title: Bok, die Valse Koning
description: Nou weet jy hoekom bokke so hardkoppig is!
author: Fanie Viljoen

title: Gʊmɛnɛ gʊɖǝn kʊfǝl gapapiri nɩ
description: Mbʊpá njala nɖe n tɩ lǝ atʊ ʊshilé nɖee gʊmɛnɛ gʊɖǝn gʊ fǝl Kabiiru agapapiri nɩ ma.
author: Moumouni  FAFANA

title: Musa na paka
description: Musa anamuokota paka akiwa njiani kutoka shuleni kisha anamnyanyasa. Baadaye,  anaota ndoto inayobadilisha tabia zake mbovu.
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Hare  Trickster
description: Hare anacheza tena mbinu!
author: TURIGYE PATIENCE

title: Kyabazinga Omubi
description: Buti oidhi lwaki embuzi dhikola inho obutumbaavu! Now you know why goats are so stubborn!
author: Daudi Waidhuuba-Isendabaguzi

title: What Type of Teeth?
description: Indaba ikhuluma ngezilwane ezahlukile kanye namazinyo azo ahlukile, ezinye izilwane zinamazinyo abukhali, ezinye zinamazinyo aqinile kanti ezinye izilwane azinawo amazinyo
author: Zanele Buthelezi

title: Kwetetswe!
description: Pale e tsotehang  moo bashanyana ba babedi ba kwetelwang bakeng la phapanyetsano ya tjhelete.
author: Tseliso Masolane

title: መታለሊ ማንቲለ
description: ማንቲለ ምትላሉ ቐፂሉ ኣሎ። ሕዚ ክኣ እንታይ ከምዝገብር እዚ ታሪኽ ኣንብቡ እሞ እስቲ ተዓዘቡ።
author: Angesom Abadi

title: Goat, the false king
description: Now you know why goats are so stubborn!
author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere

title: Musa ni puusi
description: Musa talabirira puusi yeyalonda nga ava ku isomero. Aye musa ali ne ekilooto ekigema ku puusi egicuusacuusa empisa dhe embi.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Kala Lo Gbo'Da Adidinyo?
description: Kijakura ku'de kilo gbo ku kala laga lopi lo kukuwani, ku'de kilo ku kala laga alopa'daka lo jiyoni nyosu. Ku'de kilo kijakura ‘ba kala. 'Bo laga do?
author: Abu Enock

title: Rainbow visits the village
description: A boy is out in the fields and sees a rainbow for the first time. He doesn't know what the rainbow is.
author: Ursula Nafula

title: (Colour-in) How Tortoise got a crooked nose
description: Don't be too quick to enter a fight! Colour-in storybook. (Also available at Level 3.).
author: African Storybook

title: Musar
description: Musar cho kicheb aboo.
author: Dessailly A.B. Chirchir

title: Un Arc-En-Ciel De Passage Au Village
description: Un garçon se promène dans les champs quand soudain il aperçoit un arc-en-ciel pour la première fois de sa vie. Il ne sait pas ce qu'est un arc-en-ciel, mais il aimerait pouvoir le garder dans son village.
author: Patricia Roth

title: Go gapiwa ka dikgoka!
description: Padi e e ka ga basimane ba babedi b aba gapiwang ka dikgoka.
author: Lorato Trok

title: 'The Ransom of Red Chief,' by O. Henry
Ni Ubuhe Bwoko Bw'Amenyo?
description: Hari inyamaswa zifite amenyo atyaye zikoresha mu kurumana. Izindi z'ifite amenyo abwataraye zikoresha mu gutapfuna. Hari n'izitagira amenyo. Wowe se bite?
author: Sylvestre Ntabajyana

title: Imbuzi, inkosi eyayingenalo iqiniso
description: Manje usuyazi ukuthi kungani izimbuzi zinenkani!
author: Nokuthula Zondi

title: Siku tuliyouona upinde
description: Mvulana anauona upinde kwa mara ya kwanza. Bila kujua ni nini,  anatamani ikiwa wangeuweka kijijini mwao.
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Meno aina gani?
description: Wanyama mbali mbali wana meno tofauti.
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: ቅርስስቲ መዓልቲ
description: እዚ ታሪኽ ብዛዕባ ክልተ ተጨወዩ ቆልዑ እዩ። እቶም ቆልዑ ሓደጋ ኣብ ዘለዎ ጉዕዞ ኣትዮም ነይሮም፤ ኣብ መወዳእታ ግን ድሒኖም።
author: Angesom Abadi

title: Mfalme mbaya
description: Sasa unajua kwa nini mbuzi wanakataa kuvutwa!
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Musau amwokoa babake
description: Babake Musau alilewa kila usiku. Aliporjea nyumbani,  aliwaamsha wanakijiji akisingizia kuwa anavamiwa hadi siku moja alipovamiwa kweli lakini watu walikuwa wamechoka naye.
author: Ursula  Nafula

title: Sí Má Éséle Ngó Lé Rɨ 'ɨ?
description: Some animals have sharp teeth for biting. Other animals have flat teeth for grinding. Some animals don't have any teeth. What about you?
author: Aga Khan Foundation

title: Mbuzi, mfalme bandia
description: Sasa unajua kwa nini mbuzi wana kiburi! Soma hadithi hii upate kujua yaliyotokea.
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: Funyaan Qocaa
description: Lolaaf hin ariifatina.
author: Mulualem  Daba

title: U Dzhiiwa Nga Khani
description: Mutambo u takadzaho he vhatukanavha dzhiiwa nga khani hu tshi itelwa tshelede.
author: Yvonne Mulovhedzi

title: Musau na babake
description: Babake Musau alilewa kila usiku. Siku moja alivamiwa na fisi lakini watu walikuwa wamechoka naye. Je,  nani atamsaidia?
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Rə́mé du kiŋgàn é ntèʼ
description: Wàn kì dzə́ e kwaʼ,  e nèn yèn rə̀m a dzə̀ə́ kàŋ və wo mbìy. Wù yòʼ kì ji sà dzə̀ ka kee shoon a.
author: Beatrice Tafon Takeh

title: Ku Tlhakisiwa!
description: Xitori xo tsakisa xa majaha mambirhi lama tlhakisiwaka leswaku ku ta laviwa mali yo va tshunxa.
author: Arnold Mushwana

title: የኤሊ አፍንጫ ለምን እንደተጣመመ
description: ድብድብ ውስጥ ለመግባት እጅግ አትጣደፉ! ይህ የሚያመጣው የራሱ ችግር ሊኖረው እንደሚችል እናንብብ፡፡
author: Mezemir Girma

title: Veeru Goes to the Circus
description: Veeru comes back from the Jumbo-Mumbo Circus with some very big ideas. Read on to find out more.

title: Meeno Gangeri Hi?
description: Meeno g'engeriki?
author: Mubbalya Charles

title: Fon wo bi
description: A dzə̀ lèn à kìíy bìʼka wo bvə́y si yii tén fo á wáa sə̀ŋ áwune səŋen!
author: Beatrice Tafon Takeh

title: Musoke acaalira e'kyalo
description: Omwisuka bweyali mu'nimiro yabona musoke omulundi ogusooka. Taidhi musoke niki.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Mutiibwa ayega okusoma
description: Mutiibwa yaakeega okusoma era ayenda inho okusomera abantu abendhawulo kumpi buli kintu kyayagaana.
author: Joseph  Mukwaya

title: Abʊŋajakpa agɩŋʊnʊ gɩsɔɖɔkakoɖo
description: Mbʊpá njala nɖe n tɩ lǝ atʊ ɖaa abʊŋajakpa na galɩŋɩ ba jɩ gʊsoro naa abʊŋajakpa agɩŋʊnʊ gɩ pra gɩsɔɖɔkakoɖo, a na lige na ma ma.
author: Hakimou ATTI KALAM

title: Abusek Na Irworo
description: Eriamunosi ng'apesur ng'auni naachik ka ekaburon lo eyachakinit atamar asaki ng'akito nakipoet. Abu ekaburon tolema apese apei na kaneni apotu kiriamun ka ekile epei lo eng'itakin ekiro a ikoku. Nyonte esubakin anikoku kang'ini?
author: Dennis Lokitare

title: Wambuzi Isabazinga Omufere
description: Buti oidhi lwaki embuzi dhiba dha nkandya!
author: Alice Nakasango

title: Maino kika ki?
description: Ebisolo ebindi biri ni amaino amoogi ag'okulumisa. Edhindi dhiri n'amaino matereevu ag'okunaanisa. Edhindi dhiziramu maino. Ate ighe?
author: Abdul Maged Mbago

title: Muzeeyi gha  koleo
description: Akafumo kano kagema kuboluganda bo muzeeyi aja mutaghuni omulundi ogusoka.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: O Arco-Íris Visita a Aldeia
description: Um rapaz sai para o campo e vê um arco-íris pela primeira vez. Não sabe o que é, mas quer mantê-lo para sempre na sua aldeia.
author: Translators without Borders

title: The Old Man of Koleo
description: A story about the family of an old man going to the town for the first time.
author: Phellow Mmbuni

title: Die Pratende Sak
description: Hierdie storie gaan oor drie dogtertjies wat 'n groot reus raak loop naby 'n meer. Wie sal dan tot die dogtertjies se redding kom ?
author: Tariek Erasmus

title: Ggonya Omuyala.
description: Olugero lukwata ku Ggonya eyali omuyala ennyo.
author: Cissy Namugerwa

title: How Tortoise's nose became crooked
description: This story has a strong moral for us that is good advice!
author: Taiwo Ẹhinẹni

title: Ng'ikiel Lu Ikote Ai?
description: Arai ekoi lo etetemi ekikwane ang'ikiel alu eyakatar ng'itieng.
author: Simon Ipoo

title: Ghandi kolere ki?
description: Eriyo amaite ekyokukola ng'ali omumbeera embiibbi?
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Kyabazinga omubi
description: Buti oidhi lwaki embuzi tidhikiriza ku'dhighaluza!
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Le Nez Crochu De Tortue
description: Cette histoire nous offre une bonne morale à adopter dans nos vies.
author: Johanne Jean-maître

title: Muzeeyi we Koleo
description: Akagero kano kali kuboluganda bomuzeeyi agenda mukibuga omulundi ogusooka.
author: Tendo Ronah

title: Omoguko ogokwana
description: Two little girls went out to collect firewood and met with a giant who pretended to need help with firewood. The giant was about to lie and take one of the little girls when the little girl identified herself.
author: Dennis Ogaro Ondieki

title: Que Tipo De Dentes?
description: Alguns animais têm dentes afiados para morder. Outros animais têm dentes largos para triturar. Alguns animais não têm dentes. E tu?
author: Translators without Borders

title: The talking bag
description: Three little girls meet a giant who pretends to need help with firewood.
author: Caroline Lentupuru

title: Miringoki Eyamaino?
description: Ebiroso ebindi biine amaino agatoire agokuruma. Ebisoro ebindi biine amaino agaterekerire agokucankunya. Ebisiro ebindi tiibina maino. Kandi iwe?
author: Mugasa Nathanael Erisa

title: What Would You Do?
description: Does anyone know what they would do when in dangerous situations?
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Omuruchi omubi
description: Neshichiranga imbusi neiloba okhutsia neyikhweswa.
author: Peter Mandu

title: Yadda Kunkuru ya samu karkataccen hanci
description: Yadda Kunkuru ya shiga rigima ta ja masa karkataccen hanci.
author: Zubaida Nagee

title: omuzeeyi ghe koleo
description: Akagero kanho kali kubolugandha abomuzeeyi alikugya mukibuga omulundhi ogusooka.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Amer eke no bu Tawney pas
description: Halben kǝlanǝm ciwandǝm yaye mashilwaro dawartǝne dǝgaima burwowaro walle kuru kam kǝlanǝmbenro walle.
author: Apio Genny

title: Yadda Kunkuru Ya Samu Karkataccen Hanci
description: Kada Ka yi gaggawar shiga faɗa! Domin za a iya samun matsala.
author: Aysha  I. Sada

title: Muvuko Unenaa
description: Two little girls went out to collect firewood and met with a giant who pretended to need help with firewood. The giant was about to lie and take one of the little girls when the little girl identified herself.
author: Stephen Musyoka

title: Bode, O Rei Falso
description: Agora já sabes a razão da teimosia dos bodes!
author: Translators without Borders

title: Mvula
description: Mvula (Rain) is sung by children (and especially by boys who are out herding) when rain is sweeping across the fields.
author: Venda song

title: 'A White Heron,' by Sarah Orne Jewett
Oghanga kukola ki?
description: Eriyo aidhi kyaghanga okukola mu biseera eby'akabi?
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Bagandabange ababili Nelly ne Vivian
description: Aboluganda bewunyisa mpaka bwofuna abalalu nga Nelly ne Vivian.
author: Aidah Lubega

title: Girl Called Norah
description: Norah loves her doll and is worried one day when she thinks the doll is lost.
author: Annet Ssebaggala

title: Sheep who got tired of city life
description: In whatever situation you find yourself,  get ready for challenges and be claver and self-reliant. (This story was created at a Story Making Workshop in Abuja,  2018,  co-hosted by African Storybook and the British Council Nigeria).
author: Mohammed Alhaji Modu

title: Mkoba uzungumzao
description: Wasichana watatu wadogo wanakutana na jitu ambalo lajifanya kutaka msaada wao. Wakati jitu linamwongoza msichana mmoja mbali mtu mmoja anawasimamisha na kuuliza jina la msichana yule. Nini kitakachotokea kwa msichana huyo?
author: Mutugi Kamundi

title: Mvulana asiyetii
description: Kijana anapuuza ushauri wa wazazi wake. Kisia kilicho msubiri huko!
author: James Elim

title: UFudu wathola kanjani ikhala elitshekile
description: Ungabojaha ukulwa! UFudu uphetha ngani ngokujaha ukulwa?
author: Pumla Mdontswa

title: This is Norah
description: Norah loves her doll and is worried one day when she thinks the doll is lost.
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Mwaana Oohuwela
description: A story about a rebellious son,  based on Jesus' parable in Luke 15: 11-32.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Dimi naptǝ bǝrlabe kǝlanzǝn suluwuna
description: Halben kǝlanǝm ciwandǝm yaye mashilwaro dawartǝne dǝgaima burwowaro walle kuru kam kǝlanǝmbenro walle.
author: Mohammed Alhaji Modu

title: My two sisters Nelly and Vivian
description: Sisters are very amazing but not until you have stubborn ones like the Nelly and Vivian.
author: Nasirumbi Lynn

title: Uko Akanyamasyo Kagize Izuru Ribwataraye
description: Akanyamasyo kihutiye kwinjira mu mirwano kagira ngo gatabare inkima. Kahakuye izuru ribwataraye.
author: Niyifasha Epimaque

title: Okporua Eyo Nzepi Ri
description: Three little girls meet a giant who pretends to need help with firewood. The giant is leading one the girls away when a man stops them both and asks what the child's name is. What will happen to the little girl?
author: Alice Ojobiru

title: La Fille Du Nom De Norah
description: Norah aime sa poupée et s'inquiète le jour où elle pense l'avoir perdue.
author: Marianne Pasty-Abdul Wahid

title: Òkpóróá E'yó Nzépɨ  Ɨ̀ndɨ̀ Rɨ̀
description: Ezóanzɨ nyɨrɨ nyɨrɨ na fúdrì ágú àzɨ́nɨ ézʉ́, ruá be àmbôrʉ́ nɨ be. Ágú ndê 'bà 'ɨ ékɨ̀lé lè 'bá mà ko 'ɨ́mà àzà éjá sɨ̀ rɨ̀lé. Ágú ùrì ùrì rʉ́ 'dɨ̀ rɨ zámvá àlʉ nɨ mà drí sě àzí 'dɨ̀yí vʉ́ rɨ̀ sɨ̀ tè. Ágú àzɨ́nɨ esú yɨ rá zi ágú ʉ̀rì ʉ̀rì rʉ́ 'dɨ̀ mà tiá zámvá èrɨ nɨ́ muzʉ́ èrɨ be 'dà mà rú a'dɨ 'ɨ́ yá  rɨ̀. A'dɨ áfa nɨ ngá 'ɨ́ 'yé zámvá wéreá 'dɨ̀ be nɨ̀ yà?
author: Drateru Alice Maureen

title: Bagcinile Na Thabo
description: lendzatjane ibhalelwe bantfwana labakumabanga laphasi
author: Shongwe Thembekile

title: uko izuru ry'akanyamasyo ryavunitse
description: Iyi nkuru ifite inyisho nziza cyane yanatubera inama nziza.
author: Shema Isabella

title: Intama yarambiwe ubuzima bwo mu mujyi
description: Ubuzima ubwo ari bwo bwose wisangamo,  uzitegure gugangana n' ibibazo,  ugire ubwenge kandi wigire.
author: Jean Paul Harelimana

title: Mwana Wakutaika
description: A story about a rebellious son,  based on Jesus' parable in Luke 15: 11-32.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Kondoo aliyechoka na maisha ya jijini
description: Katika kila hali unayojipata,  jitayarishe kwa changamoto zake na uwe mwerevu na wa kujitegemea.
author: Ursula  Nafula

title: Bala iikati
description: Ukubala. Iqanda ukuya kwi sibhozo.
author: Nokuthula Bernelee Dyonase

title: The Human Side of Pack Animals
Ensawo eyogera
description: Obughala busatu bwayagaana omukazi omughagufu eyefuula alikwenda okumutwika enku.
author: John Kasiti

title: Jinsi Kobe alivyopata pua kombo
description: Usiwe na haraka kuanzisha vita! (Pia kuna ya kiwango cha 3).
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: Mwana Wakutaika
description: A story about a rebellious son,  based on Jesus' parable in Luke 15: 11-32.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Omuwala Norah
description: Maama wa Norah yagyawo kidole nakyooza nga Norah tategedde kino kyamweralikiriza nnyo naye oluvanyuma yasanyuka nnyo nga alowooza nti afunye kiddole ekipya.
author: Annet Ssebaggala

title: Balima Muguda
description: Abawo kale kani kale abawo Maayi ni Baaba yo ni baba ni Kanyuyi. Baza kulima mu gunda.
author: Fazila  Nambozo

title: Wandiiga eya Koowa Obulamu Bw'ekibuga
description: Mu buli mbeera gye wesanga mu,  wetegekere nga emitawaana ate beera mujaggu jaggu nga ate wemalilila.
author: Zipporah Kuteesa

title: Ensawo eyogera
description: Baghala basatu abato ba yagaana Omuwadhigo nga ye koza okubayamba ne enku.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Mwaana Oorimeela
description: A story about a rebellious son,  based on Jesus' parable in Luke 15: 11-32.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Nga Enfuddu bya funa ennyindo ekyuse
description: Tobela nga mwangu nnyo okuyingila okulwana.
author: MICHAEL KISEKKA

title: Omuwala Ayitibwa Noorah
description: Noorah ayagala dole ye,  ela mwelalikirivu olunaku lumu ngarowooza ebuuze.
author: Achileos  Kijjambu

title: Bananaaje Maamiyo Debbo
description: Suka debbo on no tawree hiinyu,  hiinyu wakkati maamiiko debbo ɓenndinta bananaaje ɗen. Ammaa nokku to maamiyo debbo on reenata bananaaje ɗen no laatani taaniiko debbo on sirri nder mettorgal ɓernde. Wakkatiiji foti taaniyo debbo on haandi heɓa faa yi'ita sirri maamiyo debbo on?
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Engeri enfuddu gyeyafuna enyindo eyagulukira
description: Tobeera mwangu nyo kuyingira mu kurwaana.
author: Lubogo James

title: The Lost Son
description: A story about a rebellious son,  based on Jesus' parable in Luke 15: 11-32.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Olbéné Oiró
description: Nétum intóyíe enkúkuû tung'áni naitaakúno kéyieu erétóto. Nérik entíto nabô. Nénang'aré olpayíán oikilíkuana enkárná enyé. Káínyoo nátaasé?
author: Leonard Kotikash

title: Omughala gwebeeta Noola
description: Noola ayenda inho doli era aba mweralalikirivu. Lwali lulala bwe yalowooza ati doli ghe,  abuze.
author: Charles Eramaga

title: The Human Side of Pack Animals
Bando ni Kyanandha
description: Olufumo olugema ku mukwano ghagati wa Bando n'ekyenandha ogumalibwawo Muntu. Emikuzi kamaala enkolagana eghanga okuteebwawo nga esinziira ku bulimba.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Omona Ompese
description: A story about a rebellious son,  based on Jesus' parable in Luke 15: 11-32.
author: Joaquim  Kambindangolo

title: Endiga eyakoowa obulamu bwe'kibuga
description: Mu mbeera yonna gye w'esangamu,  wetegekere ebizibu era obeere mw'egendereza era buli ky'oyagala nga oky'etuusaako. (olugero luno balukolera ku lusirika olukola obugero mu Abuja,  nkumi bbiri mu kumina munaana,  yakyazibwa ekitongole ky'abafirika ekikozi ky'obutabo ne n'olukiiko lw'abangereza mu Nayigyelia).
author: Maria Nyana

title: Enfuddu yafuna etya enyiindo engongobavu
description: Wanfuddu ne kamujje baali bagala sente kwekusalawo okukola amasowaani ag'okutunda mukatale gyebasanga egeege eryalumako enfuddu ennyido nefuuka yakikugu. Kuno kulabula nti topapanga kwenyigira mubuvuyo ojja kufuna obuzibu.
author: Isaac  Mutebi

title: omwisiki owubakweta Nora
description: Norah nagonza dolle ye kandi natinna nti kirokimu dolle ye neburra.
author: Tracy  Kababiito

title: Iloloti Ilomalomanga
description: Abakhana batiti bataru batsia khurenya nibabukana nende linani, nilikatia mbu lienya likhonywe tsikhwi. Linani likatia omukhana mulala ilali omusasta abasinjisia nokhureeba elira liomukhana. Nishiina shilakholekhana khu mukhana omutiti?
author: Catherine Were

title: Gizo da Ciyawa
description: Gizo malalaci ne,  marar wayo kuma ga hadama.
author: Zubaida Nagee

title: Ugali and Fish
description: A story about friendship between ugali and fish ended with the help of man. Relationships can often be built on lies.
author: African Storybook

title: Mokotla wa go bolela
description: Basetsanyana ba bararo ba ile ba gahlana le lekgema la go itira nke le nyaka thušo ka dikgong. Lekgema le fapoša yo mongwe wa basetsana mo tseleng gomme monna tsoko o ile a botšiša lekgema gore lina la ngwana ke mang. Ana go tlo direga eng ka mosetsanyana?
author: Phakane Raesetja

title: Wankudu Ne Ennhindo Engudule
description: Toghalabanira kulwana! (Kili ni ku Luse 3.).
author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere

title: O Filho Perdido
description: A story about a rebellious son,  based on Jesus' parable in Luke 15: 11-32.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Wantaama eyakoowa n'ekibuga

Sy reёl met Vuur om vir Seekoei te brand. Vuur brand al Seekoei se hare af en Haas is bly dat sy vir seekoei seer gemaak het. Dit is hoekom mens altyd seekoeie naby aan water kry en hoekom hul geen hare het nie.

title: Nokungu N'Eimbulu
description: Nonkungu is sent to her rich uncle who lives in another village by her parents. She's very excited and she's got on a beautiful beaded dress made by her mother. On her way to her uncle's village, she meets a young girl across the stream who also claims to be uncle Mtonyama's niece and is also coincidentally visiting him. She complements Nonkungu on her beautiful beaded dress and asks if she can try it on. Nonkungu agrees and when they exchange clothes she then realises that the girl is really an imbulu. She is frightened. Do you think Nonkungu's journey will be smooth? What will happen to the imbulu? Read on to find out what happens in this exciting tale!

description: Ani aligonjola empaka wakati wa Wakibe ne Wankima?
author: Anaya Ayinzabyonna Mbogo Junior

title: Nonkungu Et L'imbulu
description: Nonkugu allait rendre visite à son oncle et sa mère lui avait fait porter une très jolie jupe brodée avec des perles. En chemin vers le village de son oncle, Nonkungu rencontre une fille qui lui demande d'essayer sa superbe jupe. Quand elles échangent leurs habits, Nonkungu voit la queue de la fille et se rend compte qu'en fait c'est un Imbulu !
author: Isabelle Barth

title: Why Hippos have no hair
description: In this Nyungwe folktale,  we see what happens when Hare refuses to forgive Hippo for stepping on his foot.
author: Basilio Gimo

title: Amotoka Napus Naapolon
description: Arai Ebei edia lo esomae esukul. Abu ng'esi talakar noi kotere alimokini itokeng atamar karikori lotaun katogielak eworu lo esukul. Emuit ng'esi akiyen etaun.
author: Simon Ipoo

title: Wampiti ni Wankembo
description: Who will solve the dispute between Hyena and Monkey? (A version of this story was collected from Bale and originally narrated by Mohammed Kuyu in Oromo. An English version was written by Elizabeth Laird.).
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Kutheni iimvubu zingenaboya nje
description: Ngengozi,  uMvubu unyathela unyawo lukaMvundla. Ngomkhulu umsindo,  uMvundla wohlwaya uMvubu kabuhlungu emva kwesi sehlakalo.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Bunyaalifu
description: Umusooleli abona imotokha ifwiiti nga ikunyana ni loole mu bunyaalifu
author: Cornelius Wekunya

title: Yardar Allah
description: Duk abin zaka yi ce in Allah yaso ya yarda.
author: Muhammad Tukur Bala

title: Nonkungu Neembulu
description: Nonkungu aleeya mukutandalila banalume kabili banyina bamupeele ifyakufwala ififuma noobulungu ukuti afwale. Munshila akumenye umukashana uwamwebele ati afwaleko ifyakufwala fyakwe noobulungu. Ilyo baacinjenye ifyakufwala elyo amwene ati nimbulu!
author: Eunice Mukonde-Mulenga

title: Kibumba nga ayeenze
description: Buli kyoyenda kukola koba oti kibumba nga ayeenze.
author: Edison Kasajja

title: UNonkungu nembulu
description: UNonkungu bekayokuvakatjhela umalume wakhe. Unina wamnikela isikerde esifakwe umncamo kobana asembathe. Endleleni wahlangana nomntazana owabawa uNokungu kobana amboleke isikerde sakhe esihle khulu.
author: Phephelaphi Mnguni

title: Kungani uMvubu engenaboya?
description: Le ndaba ixoxa ngesizathu sokuthi kungani imvubu ingenazo izinwele futhi nokuxabana phakathi kwayo no nogwaja.
author: African Storybook

title: Bunyaalifu
description: Umusooleli abona imotokha ifwiiti nga ikunyana ni loole mu bunyaalifu
author: Cornelius Wekunya

title: Groot blou bus
description: Ebei en sy ma wag vir die groot blou bus om hulle stad toe te neem. Maar die blou bus het gebreek. Hoe sal hulle in die stad kom?
author: Fanie Viljoen

title: Ishima nende Ifisi
description: Abakofu babolera Ishima nende Ifisi,  "Omuse kuno nomutinyu."
author: Emily  Barasa

title: How Will You 'Ring in the New Year?'
Toe die groot, blou bus laat was
description: Bubu en sy ma staan en wag dat die groot,  blou bus hulle dorp toe neem.
author: Anita  Dall

title: Ahabenje
description: Ahabenzi n'oguloole bitomeregana.
author: Gershom Hirome

title: Katonda Agonza
description: Buli kyoyenda okukola koba oti Katonda bwa yenda.
author: John Kasiti

title: Igisamagwe ni Inkende
description: Ninde uzacha urubanza rwigisamagwe n' inkende? (oyumugani ni Mohammed Kyu wamanje kuwucha mori Oromo. Ngasobanuwe murugyereza na elizabeth Laird.).
author: Kagame Bruce

title: UNonkungu nembulu
description: Abazali baka uNonkungu bamthumela ayokuhlala nomalume wakhe.
author: Ntombizodwa Gxowa-Dlayedwa

title: Kwa nini viboko hawana manyoya
description: Sungura ni wanyama wanaosumuliwa sana kwenye hadithi za Kiafrika.
author: Wilkins Kiondo

title: UNonkungu kanye nembulu
description: UNonkungu wayesiya kwamalume wakhe. Umama wakhe wamthungela isiketi esihle esasihlotshiswe ngobuhlalu. Endleleni eya kwamalume,  uNonkungu uhlangana nentombazanyana ecela ukulinganisa izimpahla zakhe. Emuva kokuthi uNonkungu esenike lentombazanyana zonke izimphahla zakhe,  ubona ukuthi lentombazanyana inomsila!
author: Phumy Zikode

title: Akabendhe
description: Akabendhe ka benzi no oguloole kaagwire gho.
author: Isaac Kagoda

title: Lwaki Envubu Tezirina Bwoya
description: Wakayima busolo obusangibwa mungero ez'Abafirika nyingi nnyo. Bumanyidwa nnyo olw'obugezigezi n'empisa zabwo embi. Mu katabo k'engero ez'Ekifrika aka Nyungwe, tulaba Wakayima bwe yagana okusonyiwa Envubu lw'okuba yalinya ku kigere kyako.
author: Joshua Waswa Mwesigwa

title: Empisi ne Ekyende
description: Noha owa mareho ebisibu ebinwa aha gati ya akame ne ekyende?(ekitabo ekyokubaza kikatebezibwa Mohammed Kuyu omu Oromo. Kandi ekyorugereza kyikahadikwa Elizabeth Laird).
author: DAPHINE NATUKWASA

title: Goina  omuyala
description: Olufumo lugema ku Goina eyali omuyala inho.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Akabendhe
description: Omulenzi abona akatakisi n'eroole nga biri mu kabendhe.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: UNonkungu kanye nembulu
description: UNonkungu wayesiya kwamalume wakhe. Endleleni uhlangana nentombazanyana ecela ukulinganisa izimpahla zakhe. UNonkungu ubona ukuthi lentombazanyana inomsila!
author: Phumy Zikode

title: Bhazi Hombe reBhuruu
description: Ebei na aimai vake vakafamba kuenda kuchiteshi chemabhazi. Vakamirira bhazi hombe rebhuruu.
author: Precious  Gumbo

title: Ròbí Yɨ Mà 'bɨ́ko Yo À'dɨ E'yósɨ̀à Rɨ̀
description: Á'dɨ́kó Áfíríkàá 'dɨ̀á 'dɨ̀yɨ mà aléá drɨ́á Ètóó mà rú ècè nɨ́ kʉ. 'Bá nì Ètóó nɨ adrɨ́zàònzɨ́ èrɨ nɨ́ 'yelé pángá esú kókòrʉ́ 'dɨ̀yɨ sɨ̀. Á'dɨ́kó 'dɨ̀ mà aléá àmà nga à'dɨ 'ye 'ɨ́ sâ Ètóó nɨ́ gàzʉ́ Ròbí nɨ trʉ̀kósɨ̀ Ròbí nɨ́ pá tìzʉ́ èrɨ mà pá drɨá 'bo rɨ̀ sɨ̀ rɨ̀ mà vútiá nɨ̀ yà rɨ̀ nè.
author: Doris Maandebo

title: Dwem man Bagu
description: Ka an nana hime iyongo i Dwem vea Bagu? (I dzua a kwagh-hir ne sha ikyev i Bale. Or u hiin oron kagh-hir ne lu Mohammed Kuyu ken zwa u Oromo. Lu Elizabeth Laird gema un ken Zwa Batur ye.).
author: Terkule Aorabee

title: Gonya eyabile eyine ejanla
description: Gonya ekeyine enjala ya mizi,  kunyagizile enjala yalonda amizi ya gabona. Enjala yawhaho yashemerewa.
author: Nikirungi Belinda

title: (Colour-in) I like to read
description: This is a story about a little boy who loves to read stories. He loves it so much so that he wants to share a story with his family.
author: Ingrid Schechter

title: Anang'a a Ng'Amotokae
description: Abu edia king'olik ipudat ka napoleon ebukorosi
author: Alfred Esinyen

title: Goongaaji tati Fowru
description: Ndamndi dawi na hajjoya,  hawri e Fowru. Ndu wi'i ndu ñaamat ndi,  so wonaa ndi haalana ndu goongaaji tati.
author: Fary Silate Ka

title: Lwasiina Tsifubu Tsitamba Bubwoya
description: Bumatuyu bwaafuma naabi mungano tse baMasaaba ni Afirika yoosi.Bwamanyikhana naabi  mukhwibirisa buubi,ne'nga lwawa bwifubarura. Milukano luno  lwe baMasaaba ,khubona sibaho nga Matuyu walobele khukhwiyakhila Wafubu khulwe khumusamba khusikele.
author: Aryada Naomi Nora

title: Ibbasi Lyangu Lipati Lya Bbulu
description: Ebei abanyina bayanda kuya kudolopo abbaasi lyabbulu. Ibbaasi lyabbulu tiilyaboola nkaambo lilifwide. Inoono balaunka buti kudolopo?
author: Vision Milimo

title: Nokũngũ Na Yalyũka
description: Nonkungu is sent to her rich uncle who lives in another village by her parents. She's very excited and she's got on a beautiful beaded dress made by her mother. On her way to her uncle's village, she meets a young girl across the stream who also claims to be uncle Mtonyama's niece and is also coincidentally visiting him. She complements Nonkungu on her beautiful beaded dress and asks if she can try it on. Nonkungu agrees and when they exchange clothes she then realises that the girl is really an imbulu. She is frightened. Do you think Nonkungu's journey will be smooth? What will happen to the imbulu? Read on to find out what happens in this exciting tale!
author: Anna Kula

title: (Colour-in) Is Dedo really mad?
description: (Colour-in version) The people of Ogorme thought that Dedo was mad. However,  she was able to grow food to feed the community.
author: Andrews  Tawiah

title: Santa Claus Is Coming to Town!
Lwaki Wanvubu Azira Bwoya
description: Mu lufumo luno olwa aba Nyungwe,  tubona ekyabaawo Wakayima bwe yalema okusonigha Wanvubu olwo okumuniina ku kigere kye.
author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere

title: Basi Ikulu Yobilibila
description: Ebei na amai ake ayembekeza basi ikulu yobilibila kuti iwapeleke ku tauni. Koma basi ikulu yobilibila ya onongeka. Kodi Ebei na amai ake azayenda bwanji ku tauni?
author: Bether Mwale Moyo

title: Anang'a a Ng'Amotokae
description: Abu edia king'olik ipudat ka napoleon ebukorosi
author: Alfred Esinyen

title: Three truths of Hyena
description: He-Goat met Hyena on his way to pilgrimage. Hyena threatened to eat him,  unless he gives her three truths. (This story was created at a Story Making Workshop in Abuja,  2018,  co-hosted by African Storybook and the British Council Nigeria).
author: Fary Silate Ka

title: Nokũngũ Na Yalyũka
description: Nonkungu is sent to her rich uncle who lives in another village by her parents. She's very excited and she's got on a beautiful beaded dress made by her mother. On her way to her uncle's village, she meets a young girl across the stream who also claims to be uncle Mtonyama's niece and is also coincidentally visiting him. She complements Nonkungu on her beautiful beaded dress and asks if she can try it on. Nonkungu agrees and when they exchange clothes she then realises that the girl is really an imbulu. She is frightened. Do you think Nonkungu's journey will be smooth? What will happen to the imbulu? Read on to find out what happens in this exciting tale!

title: Amasila
description: Omusiani alola omutoka kwa Mercedes nende eshimotsalukongo binyola amasila.
author: Catherine Were

title: Big blue bus
description: Ebei and his mother are waiting for the big blue bus to take them to town.
author: Mecelin Kakoro

title: Nonkungu na Imbulu
description: Wakati Nonkungu anatumwa kwa mjombake tajiri,  mamake anampa sketi nzuri ya shanga avae,  kisha kwa furaha anaondoka na kwenda zake. Njiani,  anakutana na msichana anayemsihi kumpa ile sketi ili naye aijaribu. Wanapobadilishana nguo,  Nonkungu anauona mkia wa msichana yule na kugundua kwamba yule msichana hasa ni jitu na ndipo masaibu ya Nonkungu yanaanza.
author: Mutugi Kamundi

title: Dԑdo  yi  be  piᴐ?
description: Ogᴐmԑtsԑmԑ hyԑԑ Dԑdo kaa e yi puԑ. Se Dԑdo pee ngmᴐ kԑ lԑ ma bi ᴐmԑ.
author: Andrews  Tawiah

title: Gorŋo-Ɲa Nda Konjanje
description: Gorŋo-ɲa nda konjanje han kulu yoonay ga no i go. Han fo gorŋo-ɲa bina sara kala a na hari te kaŋmana hagu.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Ra Robi Olujo Biako Rii Adu?
description: Hares are popular creatures in African folktales. They are famous for behaving badly and always getting away with it. In this Nyungwe folktale, we see what happens when Hare refuses to forgive Hippo for stepping on his foot.
author: Andrua O'du Cezerita

title: When the big blue bus was late
description: Bubu and his mother are waiting for the big blue bus to take them to town.
author: Penelope Smith

title: Gorok Pa Oculu Gi Ondyek
description: Kigana me mako kwoŋ gima omiyo Oculu gi Ondyek jo kubedo mere ma kicutho.
author: Hellen Alowo

title: Nakkungu Nakintu N'Ekikule Kule
description: Nonkungu is sent to her rich uncle who lives in another village by her parents. She's very excited and she's got on a beautiful beaded dress made by her mother. On her way to her uncle's village, she meets a young girl across the stream who also claims to be uncle Mtonyama's niece and is also coincidentally visiting him. She complements Nonkungu on her beautiful beaded dress and asks if she can try it on. Nonkungu agrees and when they exchange clothes she then realises that the girl is really an imbulu. She is frightened. Do you think Nonkungu's journey will be smooth? What will happen to the imbulu? Read on to find out what happens in this exciting tale!

title: Impanuka
description: Umuhungu abona akamodoka nikimodoka kininibi bona impanuka.

title: Is Dedo really mad?
description: The people of Ogorme thought that Dedo was mad. However,  she was able to grow food to feed the community.

title: (Ekala-toma) Ikoku ka Kumbana
description: Estory loo idwe lu apolok nere lu idwe lu didik.

title: Kainyoo Pee Meata Olmakau Ilpapit
description: Eimákakí enkitejó te oó inkáatini kumók. Éíyiolót te oó ilósekîn lényená. Óre te ená átiní é Nyungwe náa ékidôl enkitejó peê éâny epalikí olmakáu peê eroró enkejú enyé.

title: (Myulamu-mu)  aye  Loy  mulalu?
description: (Myula mu mpalo). Abantu be kasozi baalowoza nti Loy mulalu. Aye,  yasobola okulima emere okuliisa ekyalo.
author: Emmanuel  Kunya

title: Le Grand Bus Bleu
description: Ebei et sa maman attendent le grand bus bleu qui va les emmener en ville. Mais le grand bus bleu est tombé est panne.  Comment vont-ils aller en ville maintenant ?
author: Véronique Thomas

title: Butaandu
description: Omwoojo nareeba emotoka na rukururana birikugwa ahari butaandu.
author: Arthur Ferguson

title: Haas en Hiëna
description: Hare and Hyena were good friends until Hare decided to be smart and got chased from Hyena's farm.
author: Chantelle Grobler

description: Nonkungu is sent to her rich uncle who lives in another village by her parents. She's very excited and she's got on a beautiful beaded dress made by her mother. On her way to her uncle's village, she meets a young girl across the stream who also claims to be uncle Mtonyama's niece and is also coincidentally visiting him. She complements Nonkungu on her beautiful beaded dress and asks if she can try it on. Nonkungu agrees and when they exchange clothes she then realises that the girl is really an imbulu. She is frightened. Do you think Nonkungu's journey will be smooth? What will happen to the imbulu? Read on to find out what happens in this exciting tale!

title: Nyonte Emakar Epir Ng'Itim
description: Erai ng'apoi ng'iteng ng'ulu eyanikinitae alokoyo a ng'ikirionok. Eyanikitae kotere eboyor loaronon. Alotoma ekoi lo lo a Nyungwe, king'olik kona awounia apoo arimakin epir na echakia ng'esi nakeju. Alotoma abobou ekoi kalo, kitatami nabo ng'esi ng'oni kidiama arimanakin tani ng'ulu kitong'oito.

title: (Colour-in) Kate is in heaven
description: (Colour-in version) Kate Namatovu was unwell. "A brain surgery." That is what the doctor said. What do you think happened to Kate?

title: Moota Njahoowa Luumo
description: Buuba bee inna muuɗum e ndeena moota mawnga ciwɗiwa nga yaaraɓe luumo.
author: Kulsumi Iisa

title: Butaandu
description: Omwoojo kureeba emotoka n'ekyimotoka birigwa ahari butaandu.
author: ANGUMYA ARTHUR

title: Eshichira Ifubu Niibula Amoya
description: Efimuna ni efilonje efichesi mu tsingano etsie shialo shiabamali. Fimanyishe khu efima efibi ne okhuswekha mu matinyu. Mu lukano lwa Nyungwe luno, khulola eshimuna shiloba okhuleshera ifubu khu olwa okhushiseena
author: Margaret Amateshe

title: Ngechi gi Ochulu
description: Gima omiyo ngechi gi ochulu juki mere ochulu gi ngechi e do ju mere woki cha ngo choni to gima thini suwa ama onyu wowo jo mito ich paka kisi ndelo okelo teko rijome ochulu e do tiyo maek suwa to ngech e do ki ja chul ma ber giki pinyi timi mee omiyo ochulu omako ngee ma kutho mach liyel.
author: Derrick Majanga

title: Nonkungu Pi Androo Be
description: Nonkungu is sent to her rich uncle who lives in another village by her parents. She's very excited and she's got on a beautiful beaded dress made by her mother. On her way to her uncle's village, she meets a young girl across the stream who also claims to be uncle Mtonyama's niece and is also coincidentally visiting him. She complements Nonkungu on her beautiful beaded dress and asks if she can try it on. Nonkungu agrees and when they exchange clothes she then realises that the girl is really an imbulu. She is frightened. Do you think Nonkungu's journey will be smooth? What will happen to the imbulu? Read on to find out what happens in this exciting tale!

title: Wuyinto
description: A Mercedes car and a truck are involved in an accident.
author: Joyce Chemitai

title: Kate is in heaven
description: Kate Namatovu was unwell. "A brain surgery." That is what the doctor said. What do you think happened to Kate?
author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere

title: Babbar shuɗiyar mota
description: Tanko da Mahaifiyarsa suna jiran babbar shuxiyar Mota ta kai su gari.
author: Lawali Kaura

title: Nakhungu Ni Imburu
description: Nonkungu is sent to her rich uncle who lives in another village by her parents. She's very excited and she's got on a beautiful beaded dress made by her mother. On her way to her uncle's village, she meets a young girl across the stream who also claims to be uncle Mtonyama's niece and is also coincidentally visiting him. She complements Nonkungu on her beautiful beaded dress and asks if she can try it on. Nonkungu agrees and when they exchange clothes she then realises that the girl is really an imbulu. She is frightened. Do you think Nonkungu's journey will be smooth? What will happen to the imbulu? Read on to find out what happens in this exciting tale!

description: In this Nyungwe folktale,  we see what happens when Hare refuses to forgive Hippo for stepping on his foot.

title: Santa Claus Is Coming to Town!
Saaca  Iikulu Iyabuluu
description: Ebei nabanyina baleelolela saaca iyabuluu pakuti ibatwale ku tauni. Nomba saaca yabuluu yalyonaike. Bushe baleeya shani ku tauni?
author: Eunice Mukonde-Mulenga

title: Kate yuko mbinguni
description: Kate Namatovu ni mgonjwa. "Anahitaji kufanyiwa upasuaji kwenye ubongo." Ndivyo alivyosema daktari. Unadhani ni nini kilichofanyika?
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Habwaki Ensere Tizigira Bwoya?
description: Obume bihangwa ebikukanya munganikyo za Afirika. Nibimanywa habwokwetwaza kubi kandi nokuba hara nakyo. Muruganikyo  runu  orwa  nyungwe,nturora  kiki  ekyabaireho  obu  akame  kayangire  kuganyira  ensere  habwokurubata  ekigere  kyayo.
author: Kangume Rhodah

title: Kotsi
description: Mošimane o bona kotsi ya koloi le lori.
author: Motlhago Sara Mohale

title: Hare and Hyenas Fight
description: Why Hyena and Hare are not friends anymore.
author: Jane Tsharane

title: Nakungu N'Embulu
description: Hale ŋaliŋo omusinde omwafu n'omuhasi wuwe. Abaatu bano baali n'omwana mulala muhana ni bamulanga baati Nakungu.Nakungu gaali muŋoono ate n'ali wahyere bugali.
author: Mugoya Job Joel

title: Ugbọala bọsụ ojii ukwu
description: Enwere nanị otu ụgbọala bọsụ n'obodo nta ebe Ebere bi. Oburu ibu dịkwa ojii. Ọ na-eme mkpọtu ebe ọdi ukwuu.
author: Nwanne  Felix-Emeribe

title: Kasalina ali mu Ggulu
description: Kate Namatovu yali bubi. Awulira obukoowu ne enyike. Yandikoze atye? "Kulongoosebwa bwongo." Omusawo bwe yagamba. Olowooza kate yaba atya?
author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere

title: Goreng Bokubu Ba Sena Moriri
description: Go tswa ga lowe mebutla e le diphologotswana tse di tlhagelelelang gantsi mo dinaaneng tsa Aforika. O itsege ka matlhajana le go fenya ka dinako tshotlhe. Naane e ga e farologane le se re se itseng ka ga matlhajana a ga mmutlwa.
author: Lorato Trok

title: Kotsi
description: Sejanaga se sennye le lori di dira kotsi ya tsela.
author: Lorato Trok

title: Nakungu N'Embulu
description: Ŋaliŋo omusinde omwafu n'omuhasi wuwe. Abaatu bano baali n'omwana mulala yenyene ni bamulanga baati “Nakungu”.Nakungu gaali muyonjo ate naali wahyere bugali. Abasaye ba Nakungu bamwenda nga bugali weene.
author: Mugoya Job Joel

title: okulwana kwa Wakayima ni Wampiti
description: Lwaki Wakayima ni Wampiti ti bamukwano naire.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Achwaa
description: Ekokini ikoku niichi ing'arakini ng'ikaureak keng taanyureta nakaatokeng naapolong ka akiyen itwaan nia asechakinit kechi?
author: Sirote Sinamwala

title: Gortogal E Kaakatal
description: Wakkati  fuu  gortogal ngal e kaakatal no gaabonndira. Nyannde gooɗom, ngam gortogal ngal yiɗaa waasude wune nder gaabonndirol ngol, ngal waɗii huunde hallunde gom.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Kate ali mu Gulu
description: Kate Namatovu yali mulwadde. "Tumulongose omutwe" Omusawo kyeyagamba. Kiki ekyadirira.

title: Kungani Imvubu Ingena Tinwele
description: Hares are popular creatures in African folktales. They are famous for behaving badly and always getting away with it. In this Nyungwe folktale,  we see what happens when Hare refuses to forgive Hippo for stepping on his foot.

title: Mhlana ibhesi ifika ngemva kwesikhathi
description: UBubu nonina balindele iBhesi eKulu eHlaza sasiBhakabhaka kobana izobathwala ibase edorobheni.
author: Phephelaphi Mnguni

title: Nonkungu O Imbulu
description: Nonkungu was going to visit her uncle and her mother gave her beautiful clothes to wear. On the way to her uncle's village, Nonkungu meets a strange girl who wants to wear the lovely clothes.
author: Leonard Kotikash

title: Tito Kiti
description: How does a little girl help her parents to recover their older daughter and to know who had wronged them?
author: Calystus Erebon

title: Bóòlù Mi Tí Ó Púpa
description: Ìtàn dídùn fún àwọn ọmọdé ní èdè Yorùbá. http://www.agaan.com.
author: Victor Williamson

title: Greed
description: What is the punishment for a greedy boy who ate too much fruit?

She complements Nonkungu on her beautiful beaded dress and asks if she can try it on. Nonkungu agrees and when they exchange clothes she then realises that the girl is really an imbulu. E mo kopa hore ba kalimisane ka mese le sefaha nako e khuts'oane ha ba ntse ba tsamaisana tsela ho ea ha Rangoane Teboho. Ha ba fihl Katse e thetsa batho ba moo e re ke eona mochana oa Rangoane Teboho. Ts'epang e be o lula naheng pela masimo a Rangoane oa hae a ntse a bina ho fihlela bafiti ka tsela ba mo utloa ebe ba bolella Rangoane oa hae. angoane oa hae o khutla le Ts'epang e be ba etsetsa Katse leqheka ka ho mo chekela mokoti o nang le lebese. Khayanga experiences the presence of her mother through songs and this special gourd.

title: Anansi Raggo
description: Dalilin da ya sanya Gizo ya ke da dogayen ƙafafu sirara.
author: Habibu Ahmed Jibrin

title: Sizwe Se Glimlag
description: Sizwe is a little boy with a big smile who thought it was him only. His mother taught him that he can share his smile without losing it. So on the way to library he smiled at his best friend Zanele and so the smile was spread all over town, to the post man, the animals, the grumpy traffic cop and more. Sizwe lost his smile in the library when they had to leave but when he walked out there was the whole town smiling with the sun having the biggest smile of all!
author: Shannon Teixeira

title: Kusakila Mutima Wacisangalalo
description: Nkanyezi anali kuyembekezela ntawi ya zuba na cisangalalo ca muzuba, koma antu a mumuzi wa Njovu analibe mutima wacisangalalo.
author: Bether Mwale Moyo

title: Neo A Fumana Fariki Ea Hae
description: Neo o lahlile fariki ea hae ka kotsi. Ho etsahetse eng ka morao ho moo?
author: Sehlopa sa Malea-lea ASP

title: Searching for the spirit of Spring
description: Nkanyezi can't wait for the Spring festival,  but the people of Ndlovu have lost their spirit of celebration.
author: Mosa Mahlaba

title: Anansi Ovilaphayo
description: Anansi bekayisifayobi esivilaphayo ukupheka. Evakashela abangani bakhe edla ukudla abakuphekile. kwathi ngelinye ilanga wathola bonke abangani bakhe besematasatasa balungisela ukudla ukuze kuvuthwe. Akavunanga ukubasiza wabese ebophela imilenzeyakhe kuwo wonke lamabhodo okwakuphekwe kuwo ukudla okumnandi. Ekuqcineni wonke imilenze yakhe yayeyibophekile engasakhoni ngisho nokuhamba wabese ewela emvuleni ngengathi bonke abangani bakhe bedonsa izintambo ukudla sekulungile njengokusho kwakhe.
author: Ntombikiayise Mathonsi

title: Khayanga En Haar Spesiale Pot
description: Khayanga se ouers is oorlede toe sy tien jaar oud was. Sy het toe by Rosa,  ŉ verlangse familielid gaan bly. Toe sy eendag na haar ouers se grafte toe gegaan het kry sy ŉ spesiale pot wat uit haar ouers se grafte verskyn het. Die spesiale pot het vir haar alles gegee wat sy nodig gehad het. Op ŉ dag het die pot geval en gebreek maar het weer heel geword.
author: Bianca Faasen

title: Sizwe's smile
description: Sizwe helps brighten up a rainy day with his smile around town.
author: Vianne Venter

title: Lynne's birthday surprise
description: Lynne has done a lot of work getting things ready for her birthday party,  but will a burnt cake ruin everything? (Also available in Level 2).
author: Leo Daly

title: Nalambaire ku Buliri
description: Muganda wange alya inho. Tayenda kuzaanha. Munda mutera okumuluma.
author: Gladys  Isooba

title: Ukufwaya Umupashi Wa Lusuba
description: Nkanyezi aleelolela inshita iyalusuba nokufwaisha ukuisefa. Abantu bamumushi uyu nabalufya umupashi wakusefya.
author: Vision Milimo

title: Le Sourire De Sizwe
description: Sizwe égaye un jour de pluie grâce à son sourire qui fait le tour de la  ville.
author: Isabelle Barth

title: Ivila elingu-Anansi
description: Kungani izicabucabu zinemilenze emide eyondile?
author: Pumla Mdontswa

title: Lynne's birthday surprise
description: Lynne has done a lot of work getting things ready for her birthday party,  but will a burnt cake ruin everything? (Also available in Level 4).
author: Leo Daly

title: Nalata Kubala
description: Litangu le kila mwana wa mushimani Yalata kubala matangu. Ulata haulu kubala matangu  mane nikwikabela ona ni lubasi lwa hae.
author: Limbali Muyendekwa

title: Omogano O'Khayanga Nekerandi Kiaye
description: The story tells of Khayanga, a 10 year old girl who is taken in by a distant, poor and frail relative after the death of her parents.  Her loss and pain lead her to seek guidance and comfort from her parents' graves.  As a sign that they are always with her, she is miraculously given the gift of a very special gourd and it becomes the source of comfort and good luck. Khayanga experiences the presence of her mother through songs and this special gourd.
author: Dennis Ogaro Ondieki

title: Ukuzuma umoya wethwasahlobo
description: UNkanyezi akazange akghone ukulinda umoya wetwasahlobo,  kodwana abantu bakwaNdlovu balahlekelwe mumoya wokugidinga.
author: Phephelaphi Mnguni

title: Berry the Bear
description: After coming back from the land following long lonely summers. Berry looked and found his friend Sassy the Seal and is telling her about all he heard and seen on terrestrial land. The biggest news was seeing the two legged creatures.
author: Sinoxolo Magaya

title: Khayanga and her gourd
description: The story tells of Khayanga,  a little girl whose parents died. Her loss and pain lead her to seek comfort from her parents' graves. She is miraculously given the gift of a special gourd,  and through this gourd she experiences the presence of her parents.
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Ilanga lamabeletho likaLynne
description: ULynne wenze umsenenzi omnengi ukulungisa izinto zomnyanya welanga lakhe lamabeletho,  kodwana ikhekhe elitjhileko lingamotjha yoke into na?
author: Phephelaphi Mnguni

title: Kitumi Kya Anansi Kwithiwa Na Maau Matheke Nyanya
description: Anansi the Spider loves eating, but doesn't want to do the work to cook a meal. He thinks of a clever way in which his friends can alert him when the food is ready. But unfortunately the plan backfires, and he ends up with very thin legs, and no food at all.
author: Stephen Musyoka

title: Nalitemwa Ukubelenga
description: Ili lyashi pamulumendo uwatemwa ukubelenga utushimi. Alitemwa ukubelenga icakuti afwaya abakushimikilako mulupwa lwakwe.
author: Eunice Mukonde-Mulenga

title: Bɔni Tsatsu Here Okpo
description: Okpo tao gbɛ nɔ ni eto ejurɔ ko ni Okpo fee lɛ lɛ najiaŋ.
author: Aisha  Nelson

title: Anansi, Igitagangurirwa k'Ikinebwe
description: Impamvu ibitagangurirwa bigira amaguru maremare. (Ishobora kandi kuboneka mu nkuru zo mu kiciro cya 4 cyo gusoma).
author: Epimaque Niyibizi

title: Ukukhangela umoya weNtwasahlobo
description: UKhwezi wayewulinde ngamehlo abomvu umbhiyozo weNtwasahlobo,  kodwa abantu bakwaNdlovu abasenawo umoya wokubhiyoza.
author: Xolisa Guzula

title: La Gourde De Khayanga
description: Khayanga a perdu ses parents, mais ils lui ont laissé une gourde avec des pouvoirs magiques. Avec cette gourde elle reste en contact avec eux, mais un jour, celle-ci se brise
author: Isabelle Duston et Véronique Biddau

title: Namaganda
description: NAMAGANDA,  n'embozi eya baana abataswika myaka mwendha. NAMAGANDA atwala ebiseera bye okweyogera ku.
author: Ibrahim  Isabirye

title: Usuku luka Lynne lokuzalwa
description: ULynne usebenze kanzima elungiselela iphathi yakhe yokugubha usuku lwakhe lokuzalwa,  kodwa ngabe ikhekhe elishile lizomosha usuku lwakhe?
author: Pumla Mdontswa

title: Silangazelela ugqozi lokubungaza intwasahlobo
description: UNkanyezi wayewulinde ngamnyama umkhosi weNtwasahlobo,  kodwa abantu bakwaNdlovu abasenalo isasasa lokugubha lo mkhosi.
author: Zanele Zuma

title: Kayannga E Jollooru Muuɗum
description: Saarooɓe Kayannga maayii, ammaa, ɓe accanii mo faandu ndu sirriiji. E faandu nduu  ɓe nanondirta, ammaa nyannde gooɗom no helii.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Hoe Mier vir Duif red
description: Die aarde is droog en Klein Mier is baie dors. Hy gaan rivier toe vir 'n slukkie water,  maar word weggespoel. Duif red Klein Mier se lewe. Hoe bedank Klein Mier vir Duif?
author: Fanie Viljoen

title: Kwa nini buibui ana miguu myembamba
description: Anansi Buibui anapenda kula lakini hataki kazi ya kupika chakula. Anawaza juu itakayomwezesha wenzake wamjulishe chakula kinapokuwa tayari. Lakini kwa bahati mbaya,  mpango unaharibika na matokeo ni sababu ya buibui wana miguu mirefu myembamba.
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: Isabukuru itangaje ya Nirere
description: Nirere yakoze ibishoboka byose kugira ngo ibirori by'isabukuru ye y'amavuko bigende neza. Buriya se umutsima wa keke ye bashiririje ntuzangiza byinshi?
author: Jean Paul Harelimana

title: Njeri
description: NJERI,is a is a story that targets children not beyond the age of nine.NJERI takes her time to talk about herself.
author: Emmanuel Cheruiyot

title: Sherehe ya kuzaliwa kwa Lina asiyoitarajia
description: Lina amefanya kazi nyingi kutayarisha sherehe ya kuzaliwa kwake,  lakini keki iliyoteketea itaharibu kila kitu?
author: Ursula  Nafula

title: Anansi mvivu
description: Sababu ya buibui kuwa na miguu mirefu myembamba.
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: Kanyenyene Mbokakavwuna Nziba
description: Nyika yayuma. Kanyenyene kalaanzala anyota. Kaunka kumulonga kuyakunywa meenda. Ono katolwa ameenda. Nziba yafwutula Kanyenyene. Ino Kanyenyene kalumba buti Nziba?
author: Edith Sikota Habwanda

title: Kayanga Da Gyanɗama
description: Kayanga ta yi rishin ma'aifanta,  amma sun bara mata gadon wata gyaɗama da wani laƙani. Da wannan gyanɗamar kamar tana tare da ma'aifan nata ne,  amma wata rana,  sai gyanɗamar ta fashe.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Namorutunga
description: Namoratunga in Turkana,  Kenya,  is an ancient site of 19 stone pillars. This story explains how those stones came to be at the site.
author: Simon Ipoo

title: Akabaaga kamazalibwa ak'okwewunyisa Lynne
description: Lyn akoze ebintu bingi okutegeka akabaaga kamazalibwa ge,  naye keeki ensilivu teyonene bulikimu?
author: Mugume Daphine

title: Leeto la go batla moya wa boitumelo
description: Mosetsana wa segatlhamela masisi o busetsa moya wa letlhabula kwa motseng wa gagwe.
author: Lorato Trok

title: Fanda-a Budanju-A
description: Fandaye amwuraanju nasuna, amma tiro buda sawowuye koljaana. Barga budadəyen lawarnja fanji, amma yim laa, budadə namngada.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Mwamene Kanyelele Kanapulumusila Nkunda
description: Ntanka niyoyuma ndipo Kanyelele kanali na njota. Kanayenda kumusinje mukumwa manzi, koma kanadonsewa na manzi. Nkunda inapulumusa umoyo wa Kanyelele. Nanga, Kanyelele kazamuonga bwanji Nkunda?
author: Bether Mwale Moyo

title: Climatology
description: The study of climate including climate systems, climate change, climate records, climate patterns and indices, and climate modelling

title: Nabbubi Omunafu
description: Nabbubi ayitibwa Anansi ayagala nnyo okulya naye ng'ate tayagala kukola mirimu gya kufumba. Asalaasala amagezi mikwano gye gisobole okumutemyako ng'emmere gye bafumbye eyidde. Ebyembi, amagezi ge yasala gaagaana okumukolera era n'eky'avaamu y'ensonga eyaleetera Nabbubi okubeera n'amagulu omunaana amawanvu ate nga matono.
author: Rebecca Kuteesa

title: Namorutunga
description: Namorutunga ni mahali pa kale Kenya penye nguzo 19 za mawe. Hadithi hii inaeleza jinsi mawe hayo yalikuja kuwepo mahali hapo.
author: Translators without Borders

title: Kubataula Milimu Ya Mbumbi
description: Nkanyezi ulibelezi kuseyelele kwa mukiti wakukena mwa mbumbi, kono batu bamwa munzi wa Tou abasana nililato nimilimu yakuseyelela mukiti.
author: Limbali Muyendekwa

title: How Ant saved Dove
description: The land is dry and Little Ant is very thirsty. He goes to the river for a drink and is swept away.
author: Judith Baker

title: Lwaki Nabbubi Erina Obugulu Munaana Obutono
description: Nabbubi ayitibwa Anansi ayagala nnyo okulya naye ng'ate tayagala kukola mirimu gya kufumba. Asalaasala amagezi mikwano gye gisobole okumutemyako ng'emmere gye bafumbye eyidde. Ebyembi, amagezi ge yasala gaagaana okumukolera era n'eky'avaamu y'ensonga eyaleetera Nabbubi okubeera n'amagulu omunaana amawanvu ate nga matono.
author: Rebecca Kuteesa

title: Namulondo
description: Namulondo mu Turukana,  mu Kenya,  n'ekifo ekirimu empagi edh'amabaale 19. Emboozi eno einhonola engeri amabaale ago ye gaidha mu kifo ekyo.
author: Rebecca Ndhibogeza

title: Ngewa Ya Kayanga Na Kĩkuu Kyake
description: The story tells of Khayanga, a 10 year old girl who is taken in by a distant, poor and frail relative after the death of her parents.  Her loss and pain lead her to seek guidance and comfort from her parents' graves.  As a sign that they are always with her, she is miraculously given the gift of a very special gourd and it becomes the source of comfort and good luck. Khayanga experiences the presence of her mother through songs and this special gourd.
author: Anna Kula

title: Ohwibulwa hwa Lynne
description: Lyn aholele emirimo mingi nga yetekehera omuholo kwaye kwo'hwibulwa,  naye cake yinyasihe yinanyase bulisindhu?

title: Namwetunga
description: Namwetunga mu Turukana mu Kenya,  kibangirizi kyaira ekirimu empango dha amabaale ikumi na mwenda. Emboozi eno einhonhola gaidhagho gatya.

title: Suraj et son ballon-tigre
description: Viens faire la connaissance de Suraj et de Sher Singh, tandis qu'ils s'amusent dans le parc.

title: मेरी प्यारी बहना
description: दो प्यारी बेहेनो कि कहानी

description: 形が大好きな猫のおはなし。猫と一緒に形を学ぼう。

title: Bablu Learns a Lesson
description: Naughty boy Bablu learns a lesson on his birthday.Read to find how,when and where.Happy  reading!

description: பானுவின் ஆடிக்கொண்டிருந்த பல் விழுந்த கதை.

title: Kuku and The Fly
description: Kuku's mom has made her favourite raspberry jam but a pesky fly ruins it. Will Kuku take revenge from the fly?

title: मेरी आँगली मेरे हाथ
description: आपने बारे में बताना

title: When I grow up...
description: This sweet story is about a little girl who is eager to grow up and travel the WHOLE world and go places!!

title: Amazaalibwa Ga Alyana
description: Alyana akoze emilimu mingi okwetegekera amazalibwa ge,  keeke ensiriivu eidha kubyonoona byona byona?

title: Khayanga na kibuyu chake
description: Khayanga,  msichana mdogo,  anafiwa na wazazi wake. Anapotafuta faraja katika makaburi ya wazazi wake,  anapewa zawadi.
author: Mitugi Kamundi

title: Comment La Fourmi Sauva La Colombe.
description: La campagne est sèche, et la petite fourmi a soif. Elle s'approche de la rivière pour boire mais se fait emporter par l'eau avant d'être sauvée par une colombe. Comment la fourmi va-t-elle pouvoir remercier la colombe?

title: Kufuna umoya weNtfwasahlobo
description: "Sitawugubha kanjani umkhosi weNtfwasahlobo emmangweni losewukhohliwe kugubha umkhosi?"

title: E`yo Ebio Ma Pa Yin I Ovuzu Izia Izia Aro Ri
description: Anansi the Spider loves eating, but doesn't want to do the work to cook a meal. He thinks of a clever way in which his friends can alert him when the food is ready. But unfortunately the plan backfires, and he ends up with very thin legs, and no food at all.
author: Doris Maandebo

title: Nature and its elements
description: This book is about nature's elements and what will happen if we don't save them.

title: ངའི་ཁྱི་ཕྲུག
description: ང་དང་ངའི་ཁྱི་ཕྲུག་བར་གྱི་བརྩེ་བ།་

title: Je compte des animaux
description: Tous les animaux de la jungle ont soif ! Retrouve-les alors qu'ils vont boire de l'eau.

title: Londi yang Suka Berkhayal
description: Sepanjang hari Londi menghabiskan waktu dengan berkhayal. Ke mana khayalan itu membawanya?

title: Ding, Dong !
description: Comment Bébé peut-il s'endormir avec tous ces bruits autour de lui ? Découvre dans ce petit livre ce qui le dérange.

title: Nantatya Atiire
description: Hunter find Snake in their hunt for food. They both are frightened. They run away from each other.

title: Les couleurs dans la rue
description: Il y a tellement de choses à voir dans une rue. Fais une promenade tout en couleurs avec Sonu, Monu et Rina.

title: I found my pen
description: This story is about a girl and her best birthday gift. Lets see, what is happening in her birthday with the gift.

title: Mithra and the Nightingale
description: Mithra is a little girl who solves problems that she faces with help of her bird friends

title: akabaaga akamazaalibwa ak'okweghunisa lynne
description: Lyn akooze ebintu biingi okuteeka akabaga akamazalibwa ge,  aye keeki ensiliivu teeyonhenhe bulikiintu?
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Ng'Amorutung'A
description: Erai ng'amorutung'a akwap na eya ng'amoru naikote ng'itung'a aloturkan. Idodiunit poyo naka eger lokolong apeta kechi neni.
author: Simon Ipoo

title: Kugubha umkhosi weNtfwasahlobo
description: Nkhanyeti akasakwati nekutibamba ujabulele kugubha umkhosi wekungena kweNtfwasahlobo,  kodvwa bantfu baseMkhwakhweni bese balahlekelwe ngumdlandla.
author: Fakazile Armooh

title: Ebìó Òvʉ́ó Rʉ Rɨ̀
description: Èbìó ànɨ̀káníkà rʉ́ rɨ̀ lè àfa nyazà tʉ̀ te lènɨ́ àzí nyaká a'dɨ́zʉ́ rɨ̀ ngá kʉ. Esú lókìrí àzɨ́nɨ fèzʉ' èrɨ mà agyípɨ́ yɨnɨ́ ecózʉ́ èrɨ omvezʉ́ sâ nyaká nɨ́ ofʉzʉ́ 'bo rɨ̀ sɨ̀ nɨ. Te drìléònzɨ́ rʉ́ lókìrí 'dà nga drìléònzɨ́ fě bè èrɨnɨ́ ànɨ'dà banɨ e'yó fěpɨ ànɨ̀kánɨ́kà yɨ mà pá yɨnɨ́ ovʉzʉ èzʉ́ èzʉ́ àzɨ́nɨ èzɨ́á èzɨ́á rɨ̀ 'ɨ́.
author: Dorothy Fetaru

title: No Ɗayu Faaborii Wuugaandu.
description: Ceeɗu ngun no yoorii, ɗaaloolu pamaru ngun ɗomɗaama. Ngu ɓattii weendu ndun faa ngu yara, ammaa ndiyam ɗam dillidi e maggu, naako wuugaandu faabiingu. Noye  ɗaaloolu ngun yettirta wuugaandu ndun.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Amazaribwa ga lynne
description: Lyn yankora bingi kufuna ebintu bwo okwetenkatera amazaribwa ge, bayonsya omuganti basisa ebitubyona.
author: DAPHINE NATUKWASA

title: U pembelele luṱavule
description: Nkanyedzi o lindela u pembelela luṱavula fhedzi vha dzulapo vha Ndlovu vho xedza muya wa u pembela.
author: Maphaha Tshimangadzo Nelson

title: Lwashiina Wanaasi Nabubi Ali Ni Buukyele Shinaane Buunyelele
description: Wanaasi Nabubi akana naabi khuulya, ne nga s'akana khuuraamba kumulimo kwe khuuteekha  biilyo ta. Aryo wambaasa khu saambo iye lukyesilukyesi isi basaale beewe banyala baamumanyisamo nga biilyo byaabwe byashiile. Ne she khabi imbi ndi, kamakyesi kano kaalekha khumuyeeta ta, ni shishamamwo, waakila waaba ni buukyele buunyelele buuleeyi
author: Milton Eridad Shissa

title: Nampay' oomame
description: Leli iculo labantwana lesiZulu elitholakala encwadini ebizwa 'Songs Sung by South African Children' (1990,  1992 and 2002) eshicilelwe ngabakwa Grassroots Adult Education and Training Trust.
author: Liz Brouckaert

title: Yadda Tururuwa Ta Ceci Habjia
description: Daji ya bushe,  kuma tururuwa ta ji ƙishirwa. Ta kusanto tabki don ta sha ruwa amma sai ruwan suka tafi da ita kafin habjiya ta ceceta. Yaya tururuwa za ta godewa habjiyar?
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Namudira N'ehita
description: Olwolire ng'ebaayo hu hyalo hy'e Bubali omusaaja n'omuhasi wuwe ko n'omwana wawe mulala ni bamulanga baati Namudira.
author: Ivan Kaibo

title: Kayanga n'eibuga lye
description: Olufumo luno lwogera ku ka Kayanga akaghala akaafiirwa bazaaire baako. Okufiirwa kwako,  n'obulumi bwakwo bikaleetera okuja ku magombe ga bazaire baako nga kanoonhia okugumizibwa. Kaweebwa ekirabo eky'eibuga ery'endhawulo era mu ibuga eryo kawulira nga oti bazaaire baako baligho.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Anansi Omunafu
description: Haŋambi oyu balanga Namumbirya genda bugali ohulya aye sigenda hunyiiya. Kale asala olugesi abahye bamulange ni binyiiye alye hulya. Ehy'ekabi embi olugesi olwo silwamuholera era ehyo nj'ehyaŋwaho ko abe n'amagulu amaleeŋi.
author: Bukheye Mulongo Christopher

title: Dimakatso tsa letsatsi la matswalo a Lynne
description: Lynne o entse mosebetsi o mongata a bokella dintho tsa mokete wa letsatsi la hae la tswalo,  empa na kuku e tjheleng e tla senya dintho tsohle?
author: Matilda Dube

title: Ku Famba U Lavana Na Nchumu Lowu Nga Na Khombo Hi Ximun'Wana
description: Nkanyezi a nga yimelangi nkhuvo wa Ximun'wana,  kambe vanhu va ka Ndlovu va lahlekeriwile hi moya wun'we wa vona wa ku tlangela.
author: Mkomati John Mongwe

title: Ifyo Kanyelele Aapuswishe Inkunda
description: Umushili nauma. Akanyelele kali neecilaka saana. Kaaya kumumana mukunwa amenshi nomba bakapyangila kumo naamenshi. Inkunda yapususha akanyelele. Nomba akanyelele katashishe shani inkunda?
author: Eunice Mukonde-Mulenga

title: Namukhaywa
description: Story of a man whose wife bore him girls only threatens that if she gave birth to another girl he would leave her but would throw a party for her if she bore him a son. The wife goes to the mid-wife and gives birth to twin. Find out what she did next.
author: Raschel Lourens

title: Hoe Die Nag Aan Opio Se Dorp Gekom Het
description: There is no night time in Opio's village. One day he goes hunting and arrives at a place he doesn't know. When night falls there, Opio thinks he has gone blind. Then he discovers the truth and likes night so much that he takes it to his own village.
author: Erin Armstrong

title: Kayánga Ó Emókór Enyé
description: Kélimu éná átiní Kayánga, esilá oó ilarín tómôn naitubúlua entásât áísínání mórúo peê eyé intóiwúó ényená. Néya osomít ó emíón meshómo aishirakí inkuráren oó intóiwúó enyéna. Néítodolí te olmonekíé lé mókór ajó kébóítare énaaké, néyáki iná mokór enkíléjíléj. Néning Kayanga entiî é ng'ótónyé te oó isínkoliotín ó ínâ mókór.
author: Leonard Kotikash

title: Kokwane Ipiliselize Inkunda
description: Akasuba kalibalika sana mu mpanga mushinta yalusuba.
author: Lusaka Teachers

title: Lusuku lwekutalwa lwaLynne
description: Lynne wenta umsebenti lomnyenti kakhulu alungisa tintfo telidzili lakhe lekugubha lusuku lwekutalwa kwakhe,  kodvwa nje likhekhe lelishile lingamosha konkhe?
author: Fakazile Armooh

title: Munansi Omunafu
description: Ensonga lwaki ba Nawumbuli bali na bugulu butono. (Kili ni ku Luse 4.).
author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere

title: Ndayanda Kubala
description: Nibata Kubala. Kimani yonikabalela? Nikaipalela ninosi?
author: Lusaka Teachers

title: Namukhaywa (Song In English)
description: Story of a man whose wife bore him girls only threatens that if she gave birth to another girl he would leave her but would throw a party for her if she bore him a son. The wife goes to the mid-wife and gives birth to twin. Find out what she did next.
author: Raschel Lourens

title: (Colour-in) Man and Lion
description: Tells how a man escapes from certain death.
author: Ingrid Schechter

title: Utjhontjhwani usindisa izuba
description: Indawo yomile utjhontjhwani womele amanzi khulu. Waya emlanjeni wayokusela bewakhamba. Utjhontjhwani usindisa izuba.
author: Phephelaphi Mnguni

title: Hoe Sebra Sy Strepe Gekry Het
description: Dapper Sebra en Bobbejaan. (This story was donated by LAPA Publishers.)
author: Jaco jacobs

title: Khayanga Ka Etwo Keng
description: The story tells of Khayanga, a 10 year old girl who is taken in by a distant, poor and frail relative after the death of her parents.  Her loss and pain lead her to seek guidance and comfort from her parents' graves.  As a sign that they are always with her, she is miraculously given the gift of a very special gourd and it becomes the source of comfort and good luck. Khayanga experiences the presence of her mother through songs and this special gourd.
author: Dennis Lokitare

title: Nambumbi omugayaavu
description: Ensonga lwaki Nawumbuli Nambumbi ali no obugulu obuleeyiriri.
author: Francis  Bananwa

title: Namukwana (Lwembo Mu Lusoga)
description: Lugero lwa musaadha eyali ni mukazi we nga amuzaalira baana ba bughala beerere. Meni yaatisa muzaiwe ati bwanazaala omwana owundi owobughala aidha kumuleka ati aye aidha kumukolera akabaga bwanamuzaalira owobulenzi. Omukazi aja ewomusawo omuzaalisa era yaazaala abalongo. Noonia kiki kyairaku okukola.
author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere

title: Wamachina  Nakhamuka Khe
description: The story tells of Khayanga, a little girl whose parents died. Her loss and pain lead her to seek comfort from her parents' graves. She is miraculously given the gift of a special gourd, and through this gourd she experiences the presence of her parents.
author: Catherine Were

title: Káínyoo Peê Éátâ Anansi Inkejék Ísíet Rónkéní
description: Kényor Anansi, olkéndî, ainósa endáa, káke imeyíéú néyierishó. Néíng'oru olosék olikínye ilchóreta lényená áajoki eó endáâ. Káke eitú easishó olósék lénye.Óre enataáse náa ninyé oshî peê éátâ ilkendín inkejék naáado.
author: Leonard Kotikash

title: فریدہ کی دعوت
description: Farida

title: నెమలి
description: నెమలి గూరించి .

title: Review of Introduction and Unit 1 -- Unit 5
How Zebra got his stripes
description: Brave Zebra saves the day. (This story was donated by LAPA Publishers.).
author: Jaco jacobs

title: Man and Lion
description: How a man escapes from certain death.
author: Mozambican folktale

title: Indlela imbovane eyalihlangula ngayo ihobe
description: Eli libali elingembovane eyemka namanzi yaze yancedwa lihobe ekurhaxweni. Nayo yafuna ukulibuyekeza ngoncedo layo. Yalihlangula kumakhwenkwe awayefuna ukulitya.
author: Siyamthanda Jiza

title: Namukhaywa
description: Story of a man whose wife bore him girls only threatens that if she gave birth to another girl he would kill her but would throw a party for her if she bore him a son. The wife goes to the mid-wife and gives birth to twin. Find out what she did next.
author: Matthews M Wanga

title: Wamphephisa Kanjani Utsheketshe Ujuba
description: Kwakomise kakhulu ezweni uTsheketshe omncane wayenxanwe kakhulu. Wehlela emfuleni ukuyophuza kodwa amanzi amshanelela le kude. Wasizwa uJuba. Kodwa naye wakuqinisekisa ukuthi uyabonga.
author: Zimbili Dlamini

title: Khayanga le nkgo
description: Kanegelo e bolela ka Khayanga,  mosetsanyana yoo batswadi ba gagwe ba hlokofetsego. Go loba le mahloko a gagwe a dira gore a ye go nyaka khomotso mabitleng a batswadi ba gagwe. Mohlolo o ile wa direga ge a fiwa nkgo ya mehlolo,  yeo e mo thusago go ikwa a sa lahlega,  eke batswadi ba gagwe ba nale yena.
author: Motlhago Sara Mohale

title: Eyakar Anansi Ng'Akejen Ngakan-Kauni Nadiim
description: Emina asimokok Anansi akimuj nabo nyesaki akipore akimuj. Abu ng'esi kitam ng'irotin daang ng'ulu epedoreta ng'ipalon keng akitaanyun ng'esi nacha ekonio akimuj kech. Kang'una kadaang apotu ng'itamen keng kichanyut ng'akiro naronok ng'esi tokona eyakatar ng'asimokokia ng'ikejen lodiim lukooyak.
author: Alfred Esinyen

title: Hoender en Duisendpoot
description: Hoender en Duisendpoot het 'n baie mededingende vriendskap. Eendag verloor Hoender. Sy word toe so kwaad dat sy iets leliks aanvang.
author: Kaylee Spence

title: Manu and the Lion
description: How a man escapes from certain death.
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Namunyu Ni Wangwe
description: Hyena and leopard were good friends.
author: Mubbalya Charles

title: UTsheketshe usindisa uJuba
description: Kwakomise kakhulu ezweni uTsheketshe omncane wayenxanwe kakhulu. Wehlela emfuleni ukuyophuza kodwa amanzi amshanelela le kude. Wasizwa uJuba. Kodwa naye wakuqinisekisa ukuthi uyabonga.
author: Pumla Mdontswa

title: Anansi Nakalany
description: Eger lo anyunia asimokok ng'akejen nadiim tarai nakooyak.
author: Simon Ipoo

title: Holiday Experience
description: Mrs Clark gave her pupils a holiday assignment. Her pupils must draw what they enjoyed most during their holidays. The pupils draw some of the best tourist attractions in Africa.
author: Blessing Nemadziva

title: Khayanga le nkgo ya gagwe
description: Kanegelo ke ya mosetsanyana yoo ba rego ke Khayanga. O be a sotlega morago ga gore batswadi ba gagwe ba hlokofale. Yena o ile a ya mabitleng a bona go nyaka thušo. Mohlolo wa nkgo wa diragala gona mabitleng ao gomme go tloga tšatši leo,  Khayanga a bona thušo go tšwa batswading ba gagwe.
author: Motlhago Sara Mohale

title: Mtu na Simba
description: Jinsi mtu anaepuka kifo.
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: Nana Ne Lavi
description: Buli muntu atekeddwa okubeera n`obuvunanyizibwa ku ngeri gyalabirira mu abaana abato. Olugero lino lwogera ku muwala Lavi eyalemererwa okulabirira omwana omuto kubanga naye yalina emyaka munaana gyoka.
author: Annet Ssebaggala

title: Moipone Le Sego Sa Gagwe
description: Mosidi o sirelediwa ke sego sa gagwe.
author: Lorato Trok

title: Esichira Anansi Naba Norulenje Orutiti Munane
description: Anansi Olububi yachama okhulia, na siyachama mirimo nomba okhutekha tawe. Akasia liparo ngala abetsa bebe banyala khumumanyia  fiakhulia fiabo nifiakhayia.
author: Catherine Were

title: Fudu Kanguwu Bolboloa Cǝkkaanadǝ.
description: Duniadǝ ngamndu, kanguwudǝ ngudunjua. Falwuro ingi njaro kadinniya, tia ingi cadi duwon bolbolo kikkawo. Ndayin kanguwudǝ bolboloa wuseji?
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Home Alone
description: What happens when you are left alone at home? Here is Shadrack's experience.
author: Shadrack Abel Mpuru

title: Nana ni Lavi
description: Buli muntu ateekwa okuba nh'obuvunaanizibwa ku ngeri y'alabiriramu abaana abato. Olugero luno luyogera ku mughala Lavi eyalemererwa okulabirira omwana omuto kubanga yeena yali ali ne emyaka munaana gy'onka.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Omusajja N'empologoma
description: How a man escapes from certain death.
author: Ritah Katetemera
